author: PlayStation
description:
Pre-order now: https://store.playstation.com/product/EP2377-PPSA25153_00-JWE3DELUXEDITION

Meet the Lokiceratops, one of the most spectacular horned dinosaurs available for your parks in Jurassic World Evolution 3. With its huge, colourful frill and curved horns, this ceratopsian is guaranteed to be a guest favourite!

Jurassic World Evolution 3, launching 21 October and available to pre-order now on the PlayStation Store.

 #PS5 #PS5Games #PlayStation #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #HelpLifeFindAWay #FrontierDevelopments
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Lokiceratops Dinosaur Showcase | PS5 Games

Our development team explores the idea of control, and how this will affect your Guardian’s journey on Kepler.

Create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with fri
title: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate - Developer Insights: Taking Control | PS5, PS4 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005509/

In Time Flies, you’re a fly - your life is short, but your bucket list is long! Find out how long on July 31st when Time Flies comes to PS5. 

Learn an instrument, read a book, become rich, get drunk, or make someone smile. And if you don’t feel like pursuing your goals, you can just relax, clean your wings, and listen to music. Make the best of the time you have left, because we’re all going to die.

#ps5 #ps5games #timeflies
title: Time Flies - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP9000-PPSA26344_00-GHOST2DDEBUNDLE0

We are less than 100 days away from the launch of Ghost of Yōtei on PS5 on October 2! This week, we can’t wait to give you your best look yet at what to expect with a State of Play gameplay deep dive streaming on July 10.

Our State of Play features nearly 20 minutes of Ghost of Yōtei gameplay hosted by Sucker Punch’s Creative Directors, Jason Connell and Nate Fox. Beyond sharing more about Atsu’s quest for vengeance, we’re excited to show off her new weapons, new ways to personalize your journey at the edge of Japan, new special modes, and much more.

The Ghost of Yōtei State of Play gameplay deep dive will stream on PlayStation’s Twitch and YouTube channels on July 10 at 2pm PT / 5pm ET / 10pm BST / 11pm CEST.

#ps5 #ps5games #ghostofyotei #stateofplay 

Rated Mature
title: Ghost of Yōtei - State of Play Gameplay Deep Dive | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014162

Action-adventure gothic sci-fi metroidvania Somber Echoes is Available Now. 

Armed with powers bestowed by the gods, players assume the role of Adrestia, who is given a second chance to save the universe from her maniacal twin sister, Harmonia. Somber Echoes features action-packed gameplay, challenging combat scenarios, mobility-based exploration, and environmental puzzles

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Somber Echoes - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Explore the story of The Last of Us Part II Remastered in a new way - chronological order. A new, free update now available for PlayStation 5 and PC offers players a chance to explore Ellie and Abby’s emotional journeys chronologically, jumping back and forth between their stories.

Play now to explore the award-winning narrative in a unique way, and to  unlock UNCHARTED-themed skins of Joel and Tommy for Part II Remastered’s roguelike survival mode, No Return.
title: The Last of Us Part II Remastered: Chronological Mode Now Available
